snippet: Wall Street’s decline came after a disheartening jobs report in the United States and a report that showed Europe’s economies contracted at an accelerated pace last month.
abstract: Stocks suffer their biggest weekly decline in 2012 following a disappointing US jobs report and the accelerated contraction of several euro zone economies.

byline.contributor: Catherine Rampell and David Jolly contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Wall Street’s decline came after a disheartening jobs report in the United States and a report that showed Europe’s economies contracted at an accelerated pace last month.

headline.seo: Stocks Decline After Weak Jobs Report
headline.main: A Down Week, Worsened by a Weak Jobs Report
headline.print_headline: A Down Week, Worsened by a Weak Jobs Report
